EmailTemplate.subject: Dock Your Desk Out
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
View Online <[[{{system.viewAsWebpageLink}}]]> <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/en/dcr/sites/core/Gtblog-benefits-of-a-docking-station.aspx?cmp=EBBSAUGUSTBLOG19&utm_source={{my.UTM Source}}&utm_medium={{my.UTM Medium}}&utm_content={{my.UTM Content}}&utm_campaign={{my.UTM Campaign}}]]> A docking station connects your: Multiple monitors <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/EN/search/pages/browse/LCD-LED-Monitors/_/N-8tk?cmp=EBAUGUSTBLOG2019&utm_source={{my.UTM Source}}&utm_medium={{my.UTM Medium}}&utm_content={{my.UTM Content}}&utm_campaign={{my.UTM Campaign}}]]> <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/EN/search/pages/browse/LCD-LED-Monitors/_/N-8tk?cmp=EBAUGUSTBLOG2019&utm_source={{my.UTM Source}}&utm_medium={{my.UTM Medium}}&utm_content={{my.UTM Content}}&utm_campaign={{my.UTM Campaign}}]]> Wireless mouse <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/EN/search/pages/browse/Mice/_/N-8rz?cmp=EBAUGUSTBLOG2019&utm_source={{my.UTM Source}}&utm_medium={{my.UTM Medium}}&utm_content={{my.UTM Content}}&utm_campaign={{my.UTM Campaign}}]]> <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/EN/search/pages/browse/Mice/_/N-8rz?cmp=EBAUGUSTBLOG2019&utm_source={{my.UTM Source}}&utm_medium={{my.UTM Medium}}&utm_content={{my.UTM Content}}&utm_campaign={{my.UTM Campaign}}]]> Keyboard & more <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/EN/search/pages/browse/Keyboards/_/N-8rs?cmp=EBBSAUGUSTBLOG19&utm_source={{my.UTM Source}}&utm_medium={{my.UTM Medium}}&utm_content={{my.UTM Content}}&utm_campaign={{my.UTM Campaign}}]]> <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/EN/search/pages/browse/Keyboards/_/N-8rs?cmp=EBBSAUGUSTBLOG19&utm_source={{my.UTM%20Source}}&utm_medium={{my.UTM Medium}}&utm_content={{my.UTM Content}}&utm_campaign={{my.UTM Campaign}}]]> A simple plug ‘n go, and you’re connected to all your computer accessories!
Discover all the benefits a docking station provides. Learn More <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/en/dcr/sites/core/Gtblog-benefits-of-a-docking-station.aspx?cmp=EBBSAUGUSTBLOG19&utm_source={{my.UTM Source}}&utm_medium={{my.UTM Medium}}&utm_content={{my.UTM Content}}&utm_campaign={{my.UTM Campaign}}]]> Customer Service <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/en/sites/core/contact-us.aspx?cmp=EBCUSTOMERCARE2018EN&email={{lead.Email Address}}]]> | Terms & Conditions <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/en/sites/core/terms-and-conditions.aspx?cmp=EBTERMS2018EN&email={{lead.Email Address}}]]> | Privacy Policy <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/en/sites/core/privacy-policy.aspx?cmp=EBPRIVACY2018EN&email={{lead.Email Address}}]]> Grand & Toy | 200 Aviva Park Drive, Vaughan, ON L4L9C7 | 1-866-391-8111
